name: @internetarchive/bergamot-translator
description: Cross platform C++ library focusing on optimized machine translation on the consumer-grade device.

scripts.build: mkdir -p ../../build-wasm && docker run --rm -v $(realpath ../../):/src -v $(realpath ../../build-wasm):/build -v $(pwd)/worker:/dst -w /build emscripten/emsdk:$npm_package_config_emscripten_version sh -c "emcmake cmake -DCOMPILE_WASM=on -DWORMHOLE=off /src && emmake make -j2 && cp bergamot-translator-worker.wasm bergamot-translator-worker.js /dst"
